name: Building Buildings
description:
Buildings don't build themselves. Someone has to step up to the task.

Medium:

Deductive logic challenge (puzzle)

Genre:

Tile-based constraint solving

Features:

  • 50 levels in 5 sets of increasing difficulty
  • 27 unique elements
  • No nonsense
